newsitem.title: HUNGARY: HUNGARIAN O/N RATES TEST RANGE BUT CLOSE LOWER.
newsitem.headline: HUNGARIAN O/N RATES TEST RANGE BUT CLOSE LOWER.

text.p: Hungarian overnight interest rates moved in a wide range in mild activity on the first day of trading after a long holiday weekend, dealers said.
Overnight rates closed at 23.25 percent, below last Friday's 23.75 percent, after testing ranges between 22.50 and 24 percent, dealers said.
One dealer said some banks had been "heavy takers" but others reported that activity was "sleepy" after the four-day Hungarian national holiday.
